other_title: デ・ジ・キャラット クリスマススペシャル (Japanese)
plot: It's Christmas vacation and Princess Dejiko of the planet Di Gi Charat and the rest of the GAMERS crew take a break from their jobs because they've been invited on a cruise for free by Dejiko's nemesis, Princess Pyocola Analogue III (Piyoko), who is trying to capture Dejiko. Piyoko chases Dejiko around, causing distractions for Usada, who just wants to bake a Christmas cake for everyone.
opening_theme: "Megami Ni Naritai ~for a yours~ (I Want To Become a Goddess ~for a yours~)" by Masami Okui
ending_theme: "Party Night -White Version-" by Asami Sanada, Miyuki Sawashiro, and Kyoko Hikami
